description: Each day we cold press and bottle sublime raw fruit and vegetable juices. our goal is to help you have a happy body. because a happy body is a great body.We cold press and bottle amazing fresh fruit and vegetable juices. Every bottle is handcrafted and blended in our commercial juice kitchen [ not a plant. ]          100% raw & unpasteurized – nothing is added to your juice ...                                                                  no preservatives. no sugar. no water.We only use a Hydraulic press – the original and the absolute best juicer in the world.What does this mean for your body?The Hydraulic press does not apply heat – ensuring your body benefits from rich vitamins, minerals, and living enzymes.You will receive 3 to 5 times more nutrition vs. standard juicers.Our press creates the most delicious pulp-free juice - not found in juice bars or a grocery store shelf.  You can store your chilled juice for 3 days ( & up to several weeks in the freezer) without losing nutrition, flavor, or color (impossible with a standard juicer). Your body is talking to you. it’s time to listen. And "juice." is here to help.
name: Juice Nashville
